itunes:title: Robbed In New York City (Hoot And A Half)
title: Robbed In New York City (Hoot And A Half)
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary:
We combine forces with the Hoot And A Half Podcast, Matt King and Mike Sheffer come by and we talk about the bait and switch in a bar, exposing themselves to each other, opening a restaurant in New York City and getting robbed! Plus the Hot Cheeto bet comes back around for round 2, guess who sniffs it.

Check out their podcast "Hoot And A Half" everywhere now!

Follow us on instagram @lightweightspod

xoxo jo bunny and il is a pill
